duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define user requirements and iterate on design concepts.
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups to communicate design ideas effectively.
Conduct user research, usability testing, and gather insights to inform design decisions.
Develop and maintain design systems, style guides, and UI components for consistency across products.
Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies in UX/UI design and implement them when relevant.
Advocate for the user by incorporating feedback and usability findings into design improvements.
Collaborate with developers during the implementation phase to ensure design fidelity and resolve any UI/UX challenges.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Interaction Design, HCI, Graphic Design, or related field (or equivalent practical experience)
